welcome:
🌟 Welcome to AsleFlow!

👋 Nice to meet you, {name}!

🤖 I am your assistant for automating social media posts.

✨ Ready to help you make your publishing process more efficient!

📱 Use the menu to navigate or type /help for assistance.
user_not_found: User not found. Please send /start to register.
accounts.none: You haven’t added any accounts yet.
settings.none: You don’t have any active tasks. Create one.
referral.invite:
👥 Invite friends and get bonuses!

🔗 Your link: {link}
trial.allowed: 🧪 You can generate a trial post. You’ll be able to edit it before publishing.
trial.limit: ⚠️ Trial limit exceeded or you already have a subscription.
help:
ℹ️ Available commands:

/start – start and register
/help – show this help
/settings – open settings
/about – your profile info
